mapper.select: SELECT c.cmnt_no cmntNo, c.board_no boardNo, c.user_id userId, u.user_nm userNm, c.cmnt_contents cmntContents, c.c_date cDate, c.u_date uDate FROM comment c LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment( board_no, user_id, cmnt_contents, c_date, u_date ) VALUES ( #{boardNo}, #{userId}, #{cmntContents}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET cmnt_contents = #{cmntContents}, u_date = NOW() WHERE cmnt_no = #{cmntNo}
